title: News24.com | John Steenhuisen | The sprint and the marathon - winning the battle against Covid-19
description: This battle against coronavirus requires a sprint and then a marathon. How we fare in the sprint determines how we fare in the marathon, writes John Steenhuisen.
content:
2020-04-17 13:49This battle requires a sprint and then a marathon. How we fare in the sprint determines how we fare in the marathon.
The sprint is to get our strategy, systems and infrastructure in place for the marathon. Most importantly, it is to ramp up t… [+12565 chars]
